meanings.sent1: Abigails are often used in stories to represent strong and independent characters.
meanings.sent2: I met two Abigails at the party last night.
meanings.sent3: Abigails always seem to bring a sense of elegance and grace wherever they go.
meanings.sent4: Her presence in the room was like a bouquet of Abigails, each one unique and captivating.
meanings.sent5: The name Abigails has a timeless charm that resonates with many people.

meanings.sent1: The abigails in the garden were a colorful sight, fluttering around the flowers.
meanings.sent2: She collected a basket full of abigails to decorate the table for the party.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous abigails played a game of hide-and-seek in the meadow.
meanings.sent4: The field was alive with the dance of abigails, a whirlwind of movement and energy.
meanings.sent5: Each of the abigails had a unique pattern on its wings, like tiny pieces of art.
